title: Valentine's Day Special: The love crimes of Bonnie & Clyde
itunes:title: Valentine's Day Special: The love crimes of Bonnie & Clyde
description:
It's the ultimate criminal love story. The legend of Bonnie Parker and Clyde Barrow is a real story of bank robberies, murders and love. Nancy Grace visits with Bonnie's niece -- Rhea Leen LInder -- and Clyde's nephew -- Buddy Barrow to talk about their infamous relatives. Also joining the discussion is Cold Case Research Institute director Sheryl McCullom and psychologist Caryn Stark.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
